title: Marketing and Certification for Timorese Coffee

questions.question: What is a value chain in the coffee industry?
choices: The full range of activities required to bring coffee from farm to consumer
questions.answer: The full range of activities required to bring coffee from farm to consumer

questions.question: Which certification ensures that producers receive a fair price for their coffee?
questions.answer: Fair Trade

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of joining a coffee cooperative for small-scale farmers in Timor-Leste?
choices: Access to better processing facilities and stronger bargaining power
questions.answer: Access to better processing facilities and stronger bargaining power

questions.question: What is traceability in the coffee industry?
choices: The ability to track a product's history and location in the supply chain
A method of roasting coffee beans
A marketing strategy for premium coffees
questions.answer: The ability to track a product's history and location in the supply chain

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common challenge for Timorese coffee producers in accessing international markets?
choices: Developing strong relationships with international buyers
questions.answer: Overproduction of coffee

questions.question: What is a price premium in the context of coffee sales?
choices: The highest price ever paid for coffee
An amount added to a standard price, often for higher quality or certified products
A discount given to loyal customers
The profit margin for coffee roasters
questions.answer: An amount added to a standard price, often for higher quality or certified products

questions.question: Which coffee variety is Timor-Leste particularly known for?
questions.answer: Organic Arabica

questions.question: What is the name of Timor-Leste's largest coffee cooperative?
questions.answer: Cooperativa Café Timor (CCT)

questions.question: What is a key advantage of shade-grown coffee in Timor-Leste?
choices: It offers a unique flavor profile
questions.answer: It offers a unique flavor profile

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical step in the coffee value chain?
questions.answer: Advertising

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of Organic certification for coffee?
choices: To ensure fair prices for farmers
To verify that no synthetic chemicals were used in production
questions.answer: To verify that no synthetic chemicals were used in production

questions.question: Which international markets have been particularly receptive to Timorese coffee brands like Café Timor?
questions.answer: United States and Australia

questions.question: What role do intermediaries play in the coffee value chain?
choices: They brew and serve coffee to customers
They connect producers with buyers and facilitate trade
They certify the quality of the coffee
questions.answer: They connect producers with buyers and facilitate trade

questions.question: What is a key benefit of Fair Trade certification for small-scale farmers?
choices: Stable income and support for community development projects
Automatic access to all international markets
questions.answer: Stable income and support for community development projects

questions.question: How many coffee-growing families does the Cooperativa Café Timor (CCT) represent?
questions.answer: Over 20,000

questions.question: What is a potential drawback of pursuing Organic certification for Timorese coffee farmers?
choices: Strict production standards that may be challenging to meet
questions.answer: Strict production standards that may be challenging to meet

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical benefit of joining a coffee cooperative?
choices: Stronger bargaining power in price negotiations
Guaranteed sales to all international markets
questions.answer: Guaranteed sales to all international markets

questions.question: What is the primary goal of implementing robust traceability systems in the coffee industry?
choices: To enhance marketability and build trust with buyers and consumers
To eliminate the need for certifications
questions.answer: To enhance marketability and build trust with buyers and consumers

questions.question: Which of the following is a key challenge in marketing Timorese coffee internationally?
questions.answer: Improving consistency in quality

questions.question: What is the primary advantage of Timor-Leste's reputation for producing shade-grown coffee?
choices: It reduces the need for irrigation
It provides a means of differentiation in the specialty coffee market
It eliminates the need for pest control
questions.answer: It provides a means of differentiation in the specialty coffee market

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically a responsibility of a coffee cooperative?
questions.answer: Determining international coffee prices

questions.question: What is the main purpose of the role-play exercise on coffee price negotiation in the lesson plan?
choices: To demonstrate the complexity of international trade
To practice and develop negotiation skills
To set actual prices for Timorese coffee
questions.answer: To practice and develop negotiation skills

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a required resource for the lesson on marketing and certification?
choices: Price charts for coffee in various markets
questions.answer: Coffee plants

questions.question: What is the purpose of displaying various coffee packages at the beginning of the lesson?
choices: To introduce students to different coffee brands
To discuss differences in packaging, origin, and certifications and their effect on price
To test students' knowledge of coffee brands
questions.answer: To discuss differences in packaging, origin, and certifications and their effect on price

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT listed as a key vocabulary term in the lesson plan?
questions.answer: Roasting

questions.question: What is the homework assignment given at the end of the lesson?
choices: Write a business plan for a coffee cooperative
Research one international coffee company that sources from Timor-Leste
Conduct a taste test of different coffee varieties
questions.answer: Research one international coffee company that sources from Timor-Leste

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a benefit of certification for Timorese coffee producers?
questions.answer: Improved coffee quality

questions.question: What is the primary role of exporters in the coffee value chain?
choices: To package the coffee for retail sale
To facilitate the international trade of coffee
To certify the quality of the coffee
questions.answer: To facilitate the international trade of coffee

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a way for Timorese coffee producers to enhance their position in the global market?
choices: Increasing the use of chemical fertilizers
questions.answer: Increasing the use of chemical fertilizers

questions.question: What is the significance of the Timor Hybrid in the context of Timorese coffee production?
choices: It is a high-yielding variety resistant to coffee leaf rust
It is the only variety allowed for export
It is a trademarked brand of Timorese coffee
It is a new processing method developed in Timor-Leste
questions.answer: It is a high-yielding variety resistant to coffee leaf rust
